Lyric:
[00:22.738]Why does it feel like night today
[00:24.458]Something in here's not right today …
[00:26.208]Why am I so uptight today
[00:27.648]Paranoia's all I got left
[00:29.288]I don't know what stressed me first
[00:30.588]Or how the pressure was fed
[00:32.318]But I know just what it feels like
[00:34.280]To have a voice in the back of my head
[00:35.568]It's like a face that I hold inside
[00:36.998]A face that awakes when I close my eyes
[00:38.488]A face watches every time I lie
[00:39.988]A face that laughs every time I fall
[00:41.570]（And watches everything）
[00:42.820]So I know that when it's time to sink or swim
[00:45.100]That the face inside is hearing me
[00:46.770]right beneath my skin
[00:48.204]It's like I'm paranoid lookin'over my back
[00:51.334]It's like a whirlwind inside of my head
[00:54.344]It's like I can't stop what I'm hearing within
[00:57.609]It's like the face inside is right beneath my skin
[01:01.299]I know I've got a face in me
[01:02.869]points out all the mistakes to me
[01:04.449]You've got a face on the inside too and
[01:06.390]Your paranoia's probably worse
[01:07.659]I don't know what set me off first
[01:09.139]but I know what I can't stand
[01:10.449]Everybody acts like the fact of the matter is
[01:11.809]I can't add up to what you can but
[01:13.509]Everybody has a face that they hold inside
[01:15.169]A face that awakes when they close their eyes
[01:16.759]A face watches every time they lie
[01:18.290]A face that laughs every time they fall
[01:20.120]（And watches everything）
[01:21.182]So you know that when it's time to sink or swim
[01:23.392]That the face inside is watching you too
[01:25.142]right inside your skin
[01:26.217]It's like I'm paranoid lookin'over my back
[01:29.557]It's like a whirlwind inside of my head
[01:32.657]It's like I can't stop what I'm hearing within
[01:35.807]It's like the face inside is right beneath my skin
[01:39.157]It's like I'm paranoid lookin'over my back
[01:42.337]It's like a whirlwind inside of my head
[01:45.537]It's like I can't stop what I'm hearing within
[01:48.658]It's like the face inside is right beneath my skin
[01:53.466]（Tthe face inside is right beneath my skin）x3
[02:04.716]The sun goes down
[02:14.741]I feel the light betray me
[02:17.501]The sun goes down
[02:27.461]I feel the light betray me
[02:30.181]It's like I'm paranoid lookin'over my back
[02:33.581]It's like a whirlwind inside of my head
[02:36.791]It's like I can't stop what I'm hearing within
[02:39.321]It's like the face inside is right beneath my skin
[02:42.791]It's like I'm paranoid lookin'over my back
[02:46.910]It's like a whirlwind inside of my head
[02:49.251]It's like I can't stop what I'm hearing within
[02:52.471]It's like I can't stop what I'm hearing within
[02:55.491]It's like I can't stop what I'm hearing within
[02:58.291]It's like the face inside is right beneath my skin
